scripts.local-deploy-test: npm run minify && firebase use fonzo-test && firebase deploy --only hosting && node firebase-cleanup.js fonzo-test 5 commit
scripts.local-deploy: npm run minify && firebase use fonzo-prod && firebase deploy --only hosting && node firebase-cleanup.js fonzo-prod 5 commit
